pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Federal Theatre Project Scripts and Publications
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of plays, synopses of plays, lists of plays, radio scripts and three volumes of folk songs and ballads. Also includes copies of scripts from the Project archives at George Mason University and videotaped interviews with Gene Stone and Jeff Corey. A list of the radio scripts is available online.
